verbose_text: Studies have shown that abnormal expression of miRNAs contribute to the pathogenesis of hypoxia induced PH, such as miR-31a-5p through targeting of TP53, miR-135a through regulation of bone morphogenetic protein receptor type-2 (BMPR2) levels and miR-17 through targeting of mitofusin-2.
evidence: induced PH              , such as miR-31a-5p through targeting of TP53              , miR-135a through regulation of bone morphogenetic protein receptor type-2
